select article.*,tb_user.nickname as username from article left join tb_user on article.user_id = tb_user.id
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT article.*, author.nickname author_nickname, author.avatar_url author_avatar_url FROM tb_article article, tb_user author WHERE article.id = #{articleID} AND article.deleted=0 AND article.user_id = author.id

SELECT article.id,article.user_id,article.name,article.time,article.enabled,article.deleted, article.counts,author.nickname author_nickname, author.avatar_url author_avatar_url, group_concat(tags.id ORDER BY tags.id SEPARATOR ';') AS 'tags_id', group_concat(tags.content ORDER BY tags.id SEPARATOR ';') AS 'tags_content', group_concat(tags.counts ORDER BY tags.id SEPARATOR ';') AS 'tags_counts' FROM tb_article article, tb_user author, tb_tag_article tagArticle, tb_tags tags WHERE article.id IN (SELECT tb_tag_article.article_id FROM tb_tag_article WHERE tb_tag_article.tag_id = tb_tag_article.tag_id) AND article.user_id = author.id AND article.enabled=1 AND article.deleted=0 AND article.id = tagArticle.article_id AND tagArticle.tag_id = tags.id
GROUP BY article.id ORDER BY article.counts DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT article.id,article.user_id,article.name,article.time,article.enabled,article.deleted, article.counts,author.nickname author_nickname, author.avatar_url author_avatar_url, null AS 'tags_id', null AS 'tags_content', null AS 'tags_counts' FROM tb_article article, tb_user author WHERE article.id NOT IN (SELECT tb_tag_article.article_id FROM tb_tag_article WHERE tb_tag_article.tag_id = tb_tag_article.tag_id) AND article.user_id = author.id AND article.enabled=1 AND article.deleted=0
GROUP BY article.id ORDER BY article.counts DESC LIMIT 0,5
